statements: DELETE FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 456 AND game_name = 'Chess';
DELETE FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 500 AND game_name = 'Chess';
DELETE FROM CompetitionResults WHERE competition_name = 'Tournament' AND score > 50;
DELETE FROM CompetitionResults WHERE score < 50 AND competition_name = 'Beginner Competition';

DELETE FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 123 AND session_id = 456;
DELETE FROM competition_results WHERE placing > 3 AND competition_id = 789;
